sentences: Kes on eeskäsi? Eeskäsi võib võtta 6 tihi.
Kaardimängus osavõtja, kellel on õigus esimesena kaarti välja käia.
context: The Estonian word 'kaarti' has multiple grammatical forms. As a partitive singular of 'kaart', it means 'card' when referring to one unit among many or in an unspecified quantity. As an illative singular, it means 'into the card' indicating direction into something. In card game terminology specifically, it refers to the 'first hand' - the player who has the right to play first or take cards.
